comments.body: This mimics the color coding in [hack/lib/util.sh](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/hack/lib/util.sh#L778-L787) and is sourced by both [test/kubemark/start-kubemark.sh](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/test/kubemark/start-kubemark.sh#L26) and [test/kubemark/stop-kubemark.sh](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/test/kubemark/stop-kubemark.sh#L21).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +76,80 @@}

# Common colors used throughout the kubemark scripts
if [[ -z "${color_start-}" ]]; then
  declare -r color_start="\033["
